scripts.build:desktop: yarn compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn compile -w" "yarn workspace @devhub/desktop build"
scripts.deploy:web: yarn workspace @devhub/web build && yarn now && yarn now alias
scripts.deploy:www: pushd packages/www; now && now alias; popd;
scripts.dev: yarn compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn compile -w" "yarn workspace @devhub/web start" "yarn workspace @devhub/mobile start" "yarn workspace @devhub/desktop start"
scripts.dev:desktop: yarn compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn compile -w" "yarn workspace @devhub/desktop start"
scripts.dev:mobile: yarn compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn compile -w" "yarn workspace @devhub/mobile start"
scripts.dev:web: yarn compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn compile -w" "yarn workspace @devhub/web start"
